title: [Widow's Beach, Palm's Inlet]
description: Small inlets of crystal blue water run inland along carved troughs, vanishing into the tropical foliage, and pieces of driftwood pepper the white sands closest to the shore.  A lush green coconut palm arches over the beach until it is almost touching the water, anchored solidly by its thick, shaggy trunk.

Small inlets of crystal-blue water run inland along carved troughs, vanishing into the tropical foliage.  Small pieces of driftwood pepper the white sands below.  A lush green coconut tree arches over the beach until it is almost touching the water, its thick trunk the only thing holding it back.
